title: CVS Pharmacy, 5269 Calhoun Memorial Hwy, Easley, SC 29640, US - MapQuest
text: Traveled from Greenville to Easley to visit Minute Clinic as the website stated a 18 minute wait to be seen. Other locations had a minimum of 76 minutes. Well upon arrival the system states the... CVS Pharmacy (9) Advertisement Photos Also at this address Reviews (9) Watch out! Pharmacy department !! Check your prescriptions before you leave their location!!!!! I had a branded prescription that clearly states, "no substitutions" yet. They substituted my... I stopped at this CVS to see if they had Scott toilet tissue on sale, I usually go to the one on Pendleton Street, this one was closer to where I was. I see the low ratings, but my visits here... if I could give 0 stars, I would. Horrible policies and even worse customer service. I have moved all of our prescriptions to Ingles pharmacy instead. At this point I guess the bad reviews are becoming comical because they certainly aren't being addressed inside the business. And I also should blame myself for continuing to come back to this...
